channel.title: 10 Questions (FB Game)
channel.description:
So I am creating this 'game' using a social network (fb) and need ten questions. What would be a question that would be awkward (to answer) if you asked a complete stranger?
This is how the game works : Click a random friend Click a friend of that friend that you don't know. Repeat until you're 4 people deep. (Pro creeper) Choose someone the same sex as you (obviously females -> males have better odds) Proceed to get the questions answered without coming off as a giant creeper. If you let them know of the game, you lose. If they already know the game, you lose. Post screenies/chatlogs for proof.
You can blantly ask the questions or try to act smooth (hell, maybe even state that you need the questions answered for some statistical analysis project)
Anyways, a few friends of mine are going to try to accomplish this and we need questions. What should we ask?

item.title: 10 Questions (FB Game)
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:4, topic:527563”]“Why am I wasting my life asking strangers things that don’t even matter?”

PS I asked myself this question while posting.[/quote]

That would be 2ez2 answer.

Read full topic

item.title: 10 Questions (FB Game)
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

What is your number??? Umm cuz you know I kinda lost mines
And she gives it to you and u say, how is this supposed to help me find mines?
Lol jk
Have we met before? Oh we haven’t? Well, I’ll make sure u do
Have you ever had “somebody to ruv”?

Read full topic

item.title: 10 Questions (FB Game)
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

So I am creating this ‘game’ using a social network (fb) and need ten questions.
What would be a question that would be awkward (to answer) if you asked a complete stranger?

This is how the game works :
Click a random friend
Click a friend of that friend that you don’t know.
Repeat until you’re 4 people deep. (Pro creeper)
Choose someone the same sex as you (obviously females -> males have better odds)
Proceed to get the questions answered without coming off as a giant creeper.
If you let them know of the game, you lose.
If they already know the game, you lose.
Post screenies/chatlogs for proof.

You can blantly ask the questions or try to act smooth (hell, maybe even state that you need the questions answered for some statistical analysis project)

Anyways, a few friends of mine are going to try to accomplish this and we need questions. What should we ask?
